content: I'll be listing a few odds and ends from my personal collection, and to start are the following items:Lot 1The original Manzcoin in its original packaging. Price is .005 BTC with FREE SHIPPING. SOLDLot 2Solid .999 Silver Unobtanium (UNO) Bar + Protective Capsule + original hologram stickers + velvet drawstring bag. Low serial (12 / 50).NOTE: This is an early OG collectible from way back in 2014.Price is .02 BTC with FREE SHIPPING. SOLDPlease feel free to ask questions. Payments via BTC @ 3FkrEai2FTg82wZC615BFZTj8HCi57s1mz. PayPal / Venmo upon request.Stay tuned for more goodies from my personal collection... Regards,Chris

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: well that was fast - was going to offer to buy back the unobtainium bar - was actually my first sale on the collectibles forums lol
